casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Reco KAMSON. No. 275P15-1. Supreme Court of North Carolina. Sept. 24, 2015. Reco Kamson, Taylorsville, Attorney at Law, for Kamson, Reco. Robert C. Montgomery, Special Deputy Attorney General, for State of N.C. R. Andrew Murray, District Attorney, for State of N.C.

Opinion

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 5th of August 2015 by Defendant to Proceed In Forma Pauperis:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 24th of September 2015."
